item.title: Myself
item.description: A little about me I am currently an engineer in the INRIA laboratory of Rennes in the DiverSE team. At the moment, I am mainly working in relation to an initiative called Software Heritage, and more precisely about Enhancing Cybersecurity through Software Heritage. Our current objective is to study the propagation of vulnerabilities among repositories and more precisely forks. In parallel to that, I am reading and developping new skills in relation to the use of Large Language models for Software Engineering.
